name: CollaboWrite
description: CollaboWrite is collaborative story telling platform that allows users to write and illustrate collaborative stories.

name: Stumblr
description: Stumblr is pub crawl planning app that maps a barhopping route based on your current location or a specific address.

name: Planit
description: Planit is an event human resources marketplace. As a user, you act as an event owner or contributor. As an owner, you can create events, add tasks, review (and accept or reject) proposals.

name: Your Life in Weeks
description: An interactive visualization of a life in weeks. Save important events from each week of your life and see how they populate a grid of your life.

name: Reason About
description: I created this group blog as a channel for me and my peers to collaborate on blogging. The original incarnation was built Jekyll. Version two is a customized WordPress site.

name: Portfolio
description: This is meta, but I'm talking about this portfolio, right here. It was built with Angular, using John Papa's style guide.
